titles.title: A bill to expand coverage of bilateral steel arrangements to include welded steel wire fence panels, wire fabric, and welded steel wire mesh.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/9/1987--Introduced. Amends the Trade and Tariff Act of 1984 to require the U.S. Trade Representative to request the inclusion of restraints on certain welded steel used for concrete reinforcement in the coverage of each bilateral arrangement between the United States and steel exporting nations that imposes quantitative limitations on steel exports to the United States. Prohibits any country that refuses to expand the coverage of such arrangement from obtaining an exception or modification to the arrangement.
